trans-unit.source: How to call a custom API from an iOS client
trans-unit.target: How to call a custom API from an iOS client

trans-unit.source: Learn how to define a custom API and then call it from an iOS app that uses Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to define a custom API and then call it from an iOS app that uses Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: How to call a custom API from an iOS client (JavaScript backend)
trans-unit.target: How to call a custom API from an iOS client (JavaScript backend)

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to call a custom API from an iOS app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to call a custom API from an iOS app.

trans-unit.source: A custom API lets you define custom endpoints with server functionality, but it does not map to a database insert, update, delete, or read operation.
trans-unit.target: A custom API lets you define custom endpoints with server functionality, but it does not map to a database insert, update, delete, or read operation.

trans-unit.source: By using a custom API, you have more control over messaging, including HTTP headers and body format.
trans-unit.target: By using a custom API, you have more control over messaging, including HTTP headers and body format.

trans-unit.source: This topic showed how to use the **invokeApi** method to call a fairly simple custom API from your iOS app.
trans-unit.target: This topic showed how to use the **invokeApi** method to call a fairly simple custom API from your iOS app.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about using the **invokeApi** method, see the post [Custom API in Azure Mobile Services](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/carlosfigueira/archive/2013/06/19/custom-api-in-azure-mobile-services-client-sdks.aspx).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about using the **invokeApi** method, see the post [Custom API in Azure Mobile Services](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/carlosfigueira/archive/2013/06/19/custom-api-in-azure-mobile-services-client-sdks.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Also, consider finding out more about the following Mobile Services topics:
trans-unit.target: Also, consider finding out more about the following Mobile Services topics:

trans-unit.source: Learn more about creating custom APIs.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about creating custom APIs.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the source control feature to more easily and securely develop and publish custom API script code.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the source control feature to more easily and securely develop and publish custom API script code.
